nodes.text: Dantooine cane syrup was a type of syrup from the planet Dantooine. Sometime during the first three centuries after the planet Makeb's discovery during the Mandalorian Wars, members of the Hutt species found that pterathki, avian creatures native to Makeb, were particularly delicious when basted in Dantooine cane syrup.

Dantooine cane syrup was first mentioned in the Codex entry for the pterathki in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel, a 2013 Digital Expansion released for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
